name: Our O Bros
description:
A simple puzzel platformer  made for Jimjam 2 with Godot, Aseprite, LMMS, Bfxr.

!! Warning Sound is too Loud !!

Keybord controles: 

A and D = move, W = jump, Spacebar = shoot, R = reset level

Gamepad (xbox/ps):

Left Stick = move, A/X = jump, X/Square = shoot, Y/Triangle = reset

Thankyou to all of the GameDevUnderground Community for the help and being so supportive.
